verses.verse: Hear <S%H8085><s%> ye this <S%H1697>word<s%> which I take <S%H5375>up<s%> for a <S%H7015>lamentation<s%> over <S%H1004>you<s%>, O house of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

The <S%H1330>virgin<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is <S%H5307>fallen<s%>; she shall no <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H6965>rise<s%>: she is cast <S%H5203>down<s%> upon her <S%H127>land<s%>; there is none to raise her <S%H6965>up<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>: The <S%H5892>city<s%> that went <S%H3318>forth<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> shall have a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7604>left<s%>, and that which went <S%H3318>forth<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> shall have <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H7604>left<s%>, to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H1875>Seek<s%> ye <S%H2421>me<s%>, and ye shall live;

but <S%H1875>seek<s%> not <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%>, nor <S%H935>enter<s%> into <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%>, and <S%H5674>pass<s%> not to <S%H884>Beer-sheba<s%>: for <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%> shall <S%H1540>surely<s%> go into <S%H1540>captivity<s%>, and <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%> shall come to <S%H205>nought<s%>.

Seek <S%H1875><s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and ye shall <S%H2421>live<s%>; lest he break <S%H6743>out<s%> like <S%H784>fire<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, and it <S%H398>devour<s%>, and there be none to <S%H3518>quench<s%> it in <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%>.
Ye who <S%H2015>turn<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> to <S%H3939>wormwood<s%>, and cast <S%H3240>down<s%> <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> to the <S%H776>earth<s%>,

seek him that <S%H6213>maketh<s%> the <S%H3598>Pleiades<s%> and <S%H3685>Orion<s%>, and <S%H2015>turneth<s%> the shadow of <S%H6757>death<s%> into the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and maketh the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H2821>dark<s%> with <S%H3915>night<s%>; that <S%H7121>calleth<s%> for the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and poureth them <S%H8210>out<s%> upon the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H3068>(Jehovah<s%> is his <S%H8034>name<s%>);
that <S%H1082>bringeth<s%> sudden <S%H7701>destruction<s%> upon the <S%H5794>strong<s%>, so that <S%H7701>destruction<s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%> upon the <S%H4013>fortress<s%>.
They <S%H8130>hate<s%> him that <S%H3198>reproveth<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%>, and they <S%H8581>abhor<s%> him that <S%H1696>speaketh<s%> <S%H8549>uprightly<s%>.

Forasmuch <S%H3282><s%> therefore as ye <S%H1318>trample<s%> upon the <S%H1800>poor<s%>, and <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4864>exactions<s%> from him of <S%H1250>wheat<s%>: ye have <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%> of hewn <S%H1496>stone<s%>, but ye shall not <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H5193>them<s%>; ye have planted <S%H2531>pleasant<s%> <S%H3754>vineyards<s%>, but ye shall not <S%H8354>drink<s%> the wine <S%H3196>thereof<s%>.

For I <S%H3045>know<s%> how <S%H7227>manifold<s%> are your <S%H6588>transgressions<s%>, and how <S%H6099>mighty<s%> are your <S%H2403>sins<s%>â€” ye that <S%H6887>afflict<s%> the <S%H6662>just<s%>, that <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H3724>bribe<s%>, and that turn <S%H5186>aside<s%> the <S%H34>needy<s%> in the gate from their <S%H8179>right<s%>.
Therefore he that is <S%H7919>prudent<s%> shall keep <S%H1826>silence<s%> in such a <S%H6256>time<s%>; for it is an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%>.

Seek <S%H1875><s%> <S%H2896>good<s%>, and not <S%H7451>evil<s%>, that ye may <S%H2421>live<s%>; and so <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, will be with <S%H559>you<s%>, as ye say.

Hate <S%H8130><s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%>, and <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%>, and <S%H3322>establish<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%>: it may be that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, will be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> unto the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>.

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H136>Lord<s%>: <S%H4553>Wailing<s%> shall be in all the <S%H7339>broad<s%> <S%H559>ways<s%>; and they shall say in all the <S%H2351>streets<s%>, <S%H1930>Alas<s%>! <S%H1930>Alas<s%>! and they shall <S%H7121>call<s%> the <S%H406>husbandman<s%> to <S%H60>mourning<s%>, and such as are <S%H3045>skilful<s%> in <S%H5092>lamentation<s%> to <S%H4553>wailing<s%>.
And in all <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> shall be <S%H4553>wailing<s%>; for I will <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H7130>through<s%> the midst of <S%H559>thee<s%>, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Woe <S%H1945><s%> unto you that <S%H183>desire<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>! <S%H4100>Wherefore<s%> would ye have the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>? It is <S%H2822>darkness<s%>, and not <S%H216>light<s%>.

As if a <S%H376>man<s%> did <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H6440>from<s%> a <S%H738>lion<s%>, and a <S%H1677>bear<s%> <S%H6293>met<s%> <S%H935>him<s%>; or went into the <S%H1004>house<s%> and <S%H5564>leaned<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H7023>wall<s%>, and a <S%H5175>serpent<s%> bit <S%H5391>him<s%>.
Shall not the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> be <S%H2822>darkness<s%>, and not <S%H216>light<s%>? even very <S%H651>dark<s%>, and no brightness in <S%H5051>it<s%>?
I <S%H8130>hate<s%>, I <S%H3988>despise<s%> your <S%H2282>feasts<s%>, and I will take no <S%H7306>delight<s%> in your solemn <S%H6116>assemblies<s%>.

Yea <S%H5927><s%>, though ye offer me your <S%H5930>burnt-offerings<s%> and <S%H4503>meal-offerings<s%>, I will not <S%H7521>accept<s%> <S%H5027>them<s%>; neither will I regard the <S%H8002>peace-offerings<s%> of your fat <S%H4806>beasts<s%>.
Take thou <S%H5493>away<s%> from me the <S%H1995>noise<s%> of thy <S%H7892>songs<s%>; for I will not <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H2172>melody<s%> of thy <S%H5035>viols<s%>.
But let <S%H4941>justice<s%> roll <S%H1556>down<s%> as <S%H4325>waters<s%>, and <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> as a <S%H386>mighty<s%> <S%H5158>stream<s%>.
Did ye <S%H5066>bring<s%> unto me <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> and <S%H4503>offerings<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>?

Yea <S%H5375><s%>, ye have borne the <S%H5522>tabernacle<s%> of your <S%H4428>king<s%> and the <S%H3594>shrine<s%> of your <S%H6754>images<s%>, the <S%H3556>star<s%> of your <S%H430>god<s%>, which ye made to <S%H6213>yourselves<s%>.

Therefore will I cause you to go into <S%H1540>captivity<s%> <S%H1973>beyond<s%> <S%H1834>Damascus<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, whose <S%H8034>name<s%> is the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.
